headline: Stanley Black & Decker Board Refresh Tests Investor Views On Execution
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE:SWK) has announced a planned leadership transition, with Debra Crew set to become Chair of the Board following the retirement of Donald Allan, Jr. Shane M. O'Kelly has joined the Board of Directors, adding a new voice to the company’s governance structure. Francesca Campbell has been appointed Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary, assuming responsibility for legal and corporate governance functions. These leadership moves come as...
